docs.snippet: AT&T Inc's proposed $85 billion takeover of Time Warner Inc generated skepticism among both Democrats and Republicans on Sunday, making it more likely that regulators will closely scrutinize the effort to create a new telecommunications and me...
docs.lead_paragraph: AT&T Inc's proposed $85 billion takeover of Time Warner Inc generated skepticism among both Democrats and Republicans on Sunday, making it more likely that regulators will closely scrutinize the effort to create a new telecommunications and media giant.

headline.main: AT&T-Time Warner Deal Sparks Calls for Scrutiny in Washington
headline.print_headline: AT&T-Time Warner Deal Sparks Calls for Scrutiny in Washington

docs.lead_paragraph: You probably already know whether you'll vote for Donald Trump or Hillary Clinton on Election Day, leaving one important question to consider when you walk into your polling place: Is it OK to take a picture of your ballot?

docs.snippet: AT&T Inc said on Saturday it agreed to buy Time Warner Inc for $85.4 billion, the boldest move yet by a telecommunications company to acquire content to stream over its network to attract a growing number of online viewers....
docs.lead_paragraph: AT&T Inc said on Saturday it agreed to buy Time Warner Inc for $85.4 billion, the boldest move yet by a telecommunications company to acquire content to stream over its network to attract a growing number of online viewers.

headline.main: AT&T to Pay $85 Billion for Time Warner, Create Telecom-Media Giant
headline.print_headline: AT&T to Pay $85 Billion for Time Warner, Create Telecom-Media Giant
